title: Sweeney Todd
description: THIS IS A HORROR COOL COLLECTOR'S EDITION - PRINTED IN REALLY COOL MODERN GOTHIC AND CURSIVE FONTS THROUGHOUT. Check it out with the Amazon search inside feature! This is the original Penny Dreadful from "The String Of Pearls" - recently made into a movie directed by Tim Burton, starring Johnny Depp. Sweeney Todd began as a gruesome character in a series of Penny Dreadfuls - which claimed that he was a real person.
author: Anonymous
